answers.answer: You betcha.Consult your physician about use of Lantus.
Every time your BG is over 140 your body is being damaged.Your choice, if you still have a long life ahead of you you might want to limit the damage from high BG
You wrote:Your fasting is over 200 each morningto me,to any book, that is dangerously high. I would consult an Endo ASAP.Good luck
OVer 200 means you are not controlled.Normal blood sugar should be < 140 at all times.Yes, you should be back on meds, insulin, if necessary.

question: Am a diet controlled diabetic. Blood sugar is over 200 each morning. Should I be back on meds?
title: diabetes
